name: Run Run Rambit
description:
RUN RUN RAMBIT is a game about running...away!

As a nebulous beast tears up your world, you must collaborate with your fellow beings to overcome obstacles and make it to the finish line.

Choose between four different characters:

CAT BRO was hacking up a hairball when tragedy struck. Now it's just her, her catnip, and her tentacle eye trying to survive.

BOY was on his way to school when tragedy struck. Now it's just him, his his backpack, and his one massive eye trying to survive.

DUDE was just catching some rays at the beach when tragedy struck. Now it's just him, his too-tight-trunks, and his delicious tan trying to survive.

GIRAFFE had finally escaped the zoo when tragedy struck. Now it's just her, her slender neck, and her rebellious streak trying to survive.

RUN RUN RAMBIT is a local multiplayer game that can be played on one keyboard with four players. Only one key per player! Tap to survive.

~MADE BY~

Rafael Mota

Michael Perez

Matthew Pon

Brandon Saunders
